item.title: Connectiontypesbuyers: Hotel-X Buyers API
item.description:
Hotel-X API is a powerful aggregation solution that allows you to get results from the largest network of Sellers with just one request. You have the possibility to aggregate (or not!) at different levels like hotel, room type and rate plan among others. You can build on your connectivity a robust business logic by using easily a first-in-industry plugin architecture. Leverage the power and flexibility of Hotel-X plugins to get an edge over your competitors.
[...]

item.title: Connectiontypesbuyers: Channel-X
item.description:
Channel-X is an aggregating tool that allows a third partner to receive the product of the different Channel Managers in an unique standardized API. The objective of this solution is to speed up the extraction and the combination of the product for the Buyer. In order for this to work, Buyers should develop the Channel-X integration to receive the inventory in their system and be able to dispatch all the information to their clients.
[...]
